title: The Weller
description: Matt Freeborn, a weller by trade, is traveling across the Midwest, now a post-apocalyptic wasteland. While his violent past haunts him, his present is consumed by savage road pirates, grotesque mutants, and private armies. He is fully prepared to handle any of them, but there are still things even the weller fears: the boogeymen of the wastesâ€¦ distillers.
author: Adam J. Whitlatch
